thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Diego Diaz

author: Diego Diaz
title: Diego Diaz
text: I have bought several life insurance policies before and getting a new policy through Policy Genius has to be my best experience. I would highly recommend Policy Genius to anybody looking for a no-pressure, customer-driven approach to buying life insurance - who needs pushy sales people pressuring you to buy whole life insurance when all you want and need is term?
